text:
Professor's Note: On the Level I CFA® exam, you may be asked to convert
from any one of these three yields into one of the others. You should note
that the EAY and rym are merely annualized versions of the HPY. If you
concentrate on converting back and forth between the HPY and the other
yield figures, you will be well-prepared to answer these types of questions on
the Level I exam.
